entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Marathon
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:26 PM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -28.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Marathon Airport 10:00 PM EST Thursday 02 February 2023
Temperature: -28.4°C
Pressure: 102.8 kPa
Humidity: 60 %
Wind Chill: -37
Dewpoint: -33.8°C
Wind: NNW 9 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 31.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light late this evening. Low minus 31. Wind chill minus 35 this evening and minus 40 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High minus 20.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 20. Wind chill minus 40 in the morning and minus 24 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow. Temperature rising to minus 10 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning near midnight. Local amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 near midnight. Temperature rising to minus 10 by morning. Wind chill minus 27 in the evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Thursday 02 February 2023
